remedies.name: Optional charitable giving for learning and guidance
remedies.description: Offer a small, comfortable contribution to an education, mentorship, or learning-support cause on a regular basis, with a calm and respectful intention.
remedies.safety_notes: Give only within your financial comfort; avoid debt or pressure-based giving.

remedies.name: Optional Jupiter-focused mantra repetition
remedies.description: Spend a few minutes daily in quiet repetition of a short Jupiter-focused mantra or prayer from your own tradition, keeping the practice steady and non-compulsive.
remedies.safety_notes: Keep the practice emotionally safe and time-bounded; this is supportive and should not replace practical decision-making or medical care.
